solution_line_template: There are {toddlers} toddlers, which means that the children’s home has {teenagers_per_toddler} teenagers/toddler * {toddlers} toddlers = <<{teenagers_per_toddler}*{toddlers}={teenagers}>>{teenagers} teenagers
Diana will be shopping for {total_children} children - {teenagers} teenagers - {toddlers} toddlers = <<{total_children}-{teenagers}-{toddlers}={newborns}>>{newborns} newborns
